title: Hot Springs National Park: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours         The Fordyce Bathhouse is Hot Springs National Park's Visitor Center and Historic Museum.   The Fordyce Tours In 1915 reviews proclaimed the Fordyce Bathhouse as the best in Hot Springs. Now you can tour the Fordyce and see the splendor. Tours are offered daily staffing-permitting.This tour gives you a personal insight of the most luxurious bathhouse on the row.  Â        The Grand Promenade offers a place for a relaxing walk and places to view the hot springs. Gail Sears, NPS  Outdoor Tours Guided outdoor tours are offered during the summer season. Tours begin at the Fordyce Bathhouse, travel the Grand Promenade and Bathhouse Row, and return to the Fordyce. You'll hear the 4000 year old story of how rainwater becomes hot spring water and how the water was used for therapeutic baths here.
